p: The data of this study were analyzed using IBM SPSS Statistics (Version 22.0). For the analysis of the contents of eight active ingredients of different growth years, the analysis of variance (ANOVA) was conducted. The growth years were chosen as dependent list, and the content of each active ingredients was chosen as factor. The LSD pattern was used as equal variances assumed. The options of “Descriptive” and “Homogeneity of variance test” were selected. For the comparisons of the contents of active ingredients among different part, different storage time, and different processing methods, the nonparametric tests for each group of data was first conducted. The differences of data were then analyzed using Student's t-test. P ≤ 0.05 indicates statistically significance.
